fullDescription.intro:
Reads a google sheet, given the spreadsheet id and the specified range in A1 notation
The spreadsheet id can be found in the URL. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qpyC0XzvTcKT6EISywvqESX3A0MwQoFDE8p-Bll4hps/edit#gid=0.
For more information on spreadsheet ids visit:
developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#spreadsheet_id
For more information about the A1 notation visit:
developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#a1_notation
fullDescription.option: The range of the spreadsheet that should be read. E.g. "Sheet1", "Sheet1!A1:E100"
Whether the first row of the sheet should be read as column names.
Whether the first column of the sheet should be read as row ids.
